statements: SELECT * FROM ProjectSchedule;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectSchedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(team_members) AS num_team_members FROM ProjectSchedule GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT * FROM ProjectSchedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, ARRAY_LENGTH(team_members) AS num_members FROM ProjectSchedule ORDER BY num_members DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectSchedule WHERE project_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT * FROM ProjectSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_name, team_members FROM ProjectSchedule WHERE team_members CONTAINS 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM ProjectSchedule WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL AND project_id IN ('98765432-9876-5432-9876-543298765432','87654321-8765-4321-8765-432187654321') ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectSchedule WHERE project_name LIKE '%Database%'
SELECT * FROM project_managers;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_managers WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, team_member, task_description FROM project_managers JOIN team_schedules ON project_managers.project_id = team_schedules.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_managers ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, team_member, start_time, end_time FROM project_managers JOIN team_schedules ON project_managers.project_id = team_schedules.project_id WHERE team_member = 'Alice';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_managers WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team_member, task_description, start_time, end_time FROM team_schedules WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_managers WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, team_member, task_description FROM project_managers JOIN team_schedules ON project_managers.project_id = team_schedules.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, team_member FROM project_managers LEFT JOIN team_schedules ON project_managers.project_id = team_schedules.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT team_name, task_name FROM team JOIN tasks ON team.team_id = tasks.team_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, task_name FROM team JOIN tasks ON team.team_id = tasks.team_id WHERE team_name = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team.team_name, tasks.task_name, tasks.start_date FROM team JOIN tasks ON team.team_id = tasks.team_id WHERE team.team_id = 2;
SELECT project.project_name, tasks.task_name, team.team_name FROM project JOIN team ON project.project_id = team.project_id JOIN tasks ON team.team_id = tasks.team_id;
SELECT task_description FROM tasks WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM project_managers;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT manager_name, email FROM project_managers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, member_name, role FROM projects JOIN project_team ON projects.project_id = project_team.project_id JOIN team_members ON project_team.member_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_members;
SELECT * FROM project_managers;
SELECT manager_name, email FROM project_managers;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE manager_id = 1;

SELECT project_name, member_name, role FROM projects INNER JOIN project_team ON projects.project_id = project_team.project_id INNER JOIN team_members ON project_team.member_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT manager_name, COUNT(project_id) AS total_projects FROM project_managers LEFT JOIN projects ON project_managers.manager_id = projects.manager_id GROUP BY manager_name;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, status FROM Tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT t.team_name, p.project_name FROM Teams t JOIN Projects p ON t.team_lead = p.project_id;
SELECT a.assigned_date, t.task_name, tm.team_name FROM Assignments a JOIN Tasks t ON a.task_id = t.task_id JOIN Teams tm ON a.team_id = tm.team_id ORDER BY a.assigned_date ASC;
